[13-Apr-2025 10:55:33 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_nel_links_stats ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `url` VARCHAR(255), `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
